Total_Links:
Profit After Tax (PAT):FY25 PAT surged by 39.6% year-on-year to ₹1,189 crore. Q4FY25 PAT witnessed a two-fold increase to ₹386 crore, compared to ₹174 crore in Q4FY24, primarily driven by lower expenses.

Annualized Premium Equivalent (APE):FY25 APE grew by 15% year-on-year to ₹10,407 crore, crossing the ₹10,000 crore mark for the first time. However, Q4FY25 APE saw a 3% drop to ₹3,502 crore.

Value of New Business (VNB):FY25 VNB rose by 6.4% year-on-year to ₹2,370 crore. The VNB margin for FY25 stood at 22.8%.

Retail Protection Business:FY25 retail protection APE showed a strong 25.1% year-on-year growth, reaching ₹598 crore.

Annuity Segment:This segment continued its strong performance with a two-year Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 31.4% in FY25.

Retail New Business Sum Assured (NBSA):FY25 NBSA grew significantly by 37% year-on-year to ₹3.32 lakh crore.

Total In-force Sum Assured:This figure increased by 15.6% to ₹39.43 lakh crore by the end of FY25.

Dividend:The board recommended a final dividend of ₹0.85 per equity share for FY25.

Assets Under Management (AUM):As of March 31, 2025, AUM stood at ₹3.09 lakh crore, compared to ₹2.94 lakh crore at the end of the previous financial year.

Solvency Ratio:The company maintained a healthy solvency ratio of 212.2% as of March 31, 2025, well above the regulatory requirement of 150%.

Distribution:ICICI Prudential Life maintained a diversified distribution strategy across various channels including agency, direct, bancassurance, partnership distribution, and group channels.

Product Launch:The company launched 'ICICI Pru GIFT Select' in January 2025, a product designed to address customer demand for guaranteed income.

Persistency Ratios:The 13th-month persistency ratio stood at 89.1% in FY25.

Customer Base:The company reported providing insurance coverage to over 9 crore lives as of March 31, 2025.

ESG Rating:ICICI Prudential Life maintained an 'AA' ESG rating by MSCI, placing it among the top-rated Indian life insurers on sustainability parameters.

Key Financial Highlights (FY25 & Q4FY25)

ICICI Prudential Life Insurance announced its Q4 and FY25 results on April 15, 2025.
